name: Gourgarion Incubus
description:
Point and click your way inside your troubled sleep.

Find the hidden liar of the lurid Gourgarion in the profound of your nightmares.

To defeat him search deep in your dreams. But don't go unequipped: you could use a good weapon and some potions, because the final battle is hard.

made in few days for the #summerslowjams 2022
